sentences.en: Energy and mass are equal and interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 质量与能量相等而又是可以互相转换的.

sentences.en: His greatest innovation was the use of interchangeable parts.
sentences.cn: 他最大的革新在于使用了可互换的零件。

sentences.en: I've never gone along with the idea that all businesses skills are interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 我向来不大同意这种观点:各行各业的技能都可以相互替换.

sentences.en: In this manual, the terms action and statement are interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 在本手册中, 术语动作和语句是可以互换的.

sentences.en: Interchangeable spray - can nozzles fitted to can to var y width of spray.
sentences.cn: 可互换的水沫 - 罐子喷嘴适合将改变水沫的宽度装于漆灌.

sentences.en: Matter and energy are equal and interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 物质和能量是相等的,并可相互转换.

sentences.en: Stainless steel case with interchangeable croc - stamped leather straps with buckle closures.
sentences.cn: 精钢表壳,针扣式的可更换的鳄鱼真皮表带.

sentences.en: The important thing to remember, though, is are interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 然而, 需要记住的事情是支票货币是可用于交换的.

sentences.en: The smart guys use interchangeable parts to get their costs down.
sentences.cn: 聪明人使用各种可以互相调换的部件,以便降低成本.

sentences.en: These parts are fully interchangeable with those in other machines.
sentences.cn: 这些零件完全可以同其他机器的零件相互替换.

sentences.en: These two words are almost interchangeable.
sentences.cn: 这两个单词几乎可以互换使用。

sentences.en: This makes each contract freely interchangeable with another contract.
sentences.cn: 这使得某宗合同可以轻易和另一合同交换.

sentences.en: Too many companies believe people are interchangeable. Truly gifted people never are.
sentences.cn: 有太多的企业认为人才是可以替代的, 但真正有才能的人从来就是不可替代的.

sentences.en: True synonymsare entirely interchangeable ( with one another ).
sentences.cn: 真正的同义词是完全可以 ( 彼此 ) 互换的.

sentences.en: We tend to use these terms as if they were freely interchangeable forms of energy.
sentences.cn: 我们动辄使用这些术语,好像它们可以随意换用似的.

words.tran_cn: [计]可互换的；可交换的；可交替的

trans.tran_cn: 可交换的，可交替的，可互换的
trans.tran_en: things that are interchangeable can be used instead of each other
